statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeExpenses;
SELECT expense_type, expense_amount FROM EmployeeExpenses WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeExpenses WHERE expense_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, expense_type, expense_amount FROM EmployeeExpenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT expense_date, expense_type, expense_amount FROM EmployeeExpenses WHERE employee_id = 2 ORDER BY expense_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeExpenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, expense_type, expense_amount FROM EmployeeExpenses WHERE expense_type = 'Travel' AND expense_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeExpenses WHERE expense_type LIKE '%meals%' ORDER BY employee_id ASC, expense_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM EmployeeExpenses GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_expenses > 5000 ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_expenses_count FROM EmployeeExpenses GROUP BY employee_id HAVING count(*) >= 3 ORDER BY total_expenses_count DESC;
SELECT id, employee_id, travel_date, amount FROM travel_reimbursement WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM equipment_purchase WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, employee_id, equipment_name FROM equipment_purchase ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(amount) FROM travel_reimbursement;
SELECT id, employee_id, purchase_date FROM equipment_purchase WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM travel_reimbursement WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY travel_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM travel_reimbursement GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT employee_id, equipment_name, purchase_date FROM equipment_purchase WHERE employee_id = 1001 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, equipment_name, amount FROM equipment_purchase WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(id) AS total_purchases FROM equipment_purchase GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_purchases >= 3;
SELECT * FROM travel_reimbursement;
SELECT employee_id, expense_amount, expense_date FROM travel_reimbursement ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expense FROM travel_reimbursement GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department_id FROM employee_information WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM equipment_purchases WHERE equipment_cost > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM travel_reimbursement WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, expense_amount FROM travel_reimbursement WHERE expense_category = 'Transportation' AND expense_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT e.employee_name, COUNT(e.employee_id) AS total_expenses FROM employee_information e JOIN travel_reimbursement t ON e.employee_id = t.employee_id GROUP BY e.employee_name ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department_id, hire_date FROM employee_information WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01' AND is_remote_employee = TRUE ORDER BY department_id ASC;

SELECT t.employee_id, e.employee_name, t.expense_amount, p.equipment_name FROM travel_reimjsonbursements t JOIN employee_information e ON t.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN equipment_purchases p ON t.employee_id = p.employee_id ORDER BY e.employee_name, p.equipment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM travel_reimbursement;
SELECT employee_id, expense_date, expense_amount FROM equipment_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='Finance';
SELECT employee_name, location FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT equipment_id, purchase_amount, description FROM equipment_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT MAX(expense_amount) AS max_expense FROM travel_reimbursement;
SELECT employee_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM employees JOIN travel_reimbursement ON employees.employee_id = travel_reimbursement.employee_id GROUP BY employee_name;

SELECT e.employee_name, SUM(t.expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM employees AS e JOIN travel_reimbursement AS t ON e.employee_id = t.employee_id WHERE t.expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31' GROUP BY e.employee_name ORDER BY total_expenses DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM travel_reimbursement WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT expense_amount, destination FROM travel_reimbursement WHERE expense_amount > 500;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT purchase_date, item_name FROM equipment_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT role_name, department_name FROM roles INNER JOIN departments ON roles.role_id = departments.department_id;
SELECT * FROM travel_reimbursement ORDER BY expense_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_name, department, role FROM employees WHERE department='Engineering';
SELECT destination, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expense FROM travel_reimbursement GROUP BY destination HAVING total_expense > 1000;
SELECT e.employee_name, d.department_name, r.role_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.department_name INNER JOIN roles r ON e.role = r.role_name;
SELECT * FROM equipment_purchases WHERE item_cost > 500 ORDER BY item_cost DESC LIMIT 3;
